name: Yuvraj Gupta
position: BIU-Business Analyst at Axis Bank. IIT Kharagpur’23
about: As a Business Analyst at Axis Bank, I have honed my skills in data analysis, focusing on the spends and activation portfolio of Credit Cards. My experience includes transforming campaigns to personalization frameworks, optimizing campaign performance, and enhancing customer engagement. I am passionate about leveraging data-driven insights to drive impactful decisions and strategic initiatives.
